cit19.CITATION: Zeolites, crystalline aluminosilicates, are among the most important porous materials and have been extensively applied as adsorbents and catalysts in industry, attributable to their large surface areas, regular microporous channels, high thermal/ hydrothermal stability, and adjustable chemical composition, topology and morphology. [19] [20] [21]
